title: Centre for Terrestrial Ecology
description: The topics we study include plant and animal population ecology, community and ecosystem ecology, insect pest ecology and remote sensing techniques. The applications of our work relate to biodiversity conservation, to habitat management and to the delivery of important ecosystem services such as the provision of food and water, the contribution to flood control and the carbon sequestration ability of terrestrial ecosystems
keywords: environment, ecosystems, geography, conservation, habitats, landscape metrics, sustainable agriculture
